### PT3PLAY

PT3 Player for MSX-DOS


```
Vortex Tracker II v1.0
Adapted by Alfonso D.C aka Dioniso
MSX-DOS loader by NYYRIKKI
```

#### Usage

`PT3PLAY <file>`

|Parameter|Description|
|---|---|
|\<file>|Name of a .PT3 file to be played|
